author: RTÉ News
title: Bats may not pose higher virus risk than other species
description: The idea that certain creatures such as bats pose a higher risk of spreading viruses to humans may not be accurate, new research suggests.
content:
The idea that certain creatures such as bats pose a higher risk of spreading viruses to humans may not be accurate, new research suggests.
